Detailed Description

This class contains methods for solveing systems of linear equation.

Used by the Hough classes.

This class is part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

Author:
Qinyin Zhou <qinyin@mip.sdu.dk>
Version:
0.30

Definition at line 40 of file equation_solver.cpp.

References LUDecomp(), and LUSolve().

void ipl::CEquationSolver::LUDecomp (  CArray2D< float > &    A,
vector< unsigned int > &    index
) 
 

Method calculating LU decomposition of a nxn matrix a.

The method takes a matrix and stores the LU representation in the original matrix. The pivoting index is stored in the index vector.

Parameters:
a  Matrix a to be calculated. The result will be stored in a.
index  The pivot element index vector.
